chara.textHome:
The two of us came to the
beach to enjoy the ocean.

Yeah, we're usually so busy, but today we
can put it all aside and just have some fun!

If you are not too busy...
would you mind recommending
some places or activities for us?
Have you ever been fishing, Tsukasa?
Yeah, with the Amane Bamboo Studio crew.

I've fished in the ocean, in a river,
and in a lake!

My mother took me to the ocean
when I was very small.
So small that perhaps…

Yes, I believe Tsukasa may
have been there too.
Behold!

I've grown accustomed to
riding a banana boat!

My problems feel so much smaller
whenever I gaze upon the ocean.

You gotta time your tank refills just
right in a water gun fight!

Yes, we improved greatly once we learned
how to pace ourselves.
Oh?!

Tsukasa, do you notice anything...
different about the banana boat now?

I do! We're more in sync than
we were the first time we rode it!
Let's go again!
Sounds great!
Oh! This way!
I was waiting for you to get ready.
Shall we all get going for the beach?
Good morning.
It's already so hot...
We need to avoid heatstroke.
Look what I bought!

Yakisoba, grilled squid, takoyaki...
and hot dogs!
Eat whatever you like, I insist.

I'm Tsukasa Amane, the younger twin!
And I am Tsukuyo, the elder twin.

We've never met you at
the same time, have we?
Enough talk, let's go swimming!
Huh? Where are our inner tubes…
Ah! I must've left them at the beach cafe.
They're closing any minute, I'll hurry over!
*Yawn*
O-oh, pardon me!
I'm usually in bed by now…
Sorry for keeping you up so late...
Shall we go to bed?

I was playing my flute with Tsukuyo
on the shore just now!

It felt very different than playing it
at the shrine, it was really nice...
A Witch? Now?!

I wanted to relax, but I guess we
should take care of it.
All right then, let's get to it!
The two of us were in Endless Mirrors?!
Well, not us, but copies of us!
That Mirror Witch has a sick sense of humor.

Mmm... It's so sweet and cold...
and it gives me brain freeze!

How long has it been since
I've had shaved ice?
Let's have some together!

I heard that on the Minaminagi shore,
there was once this girl...
Tsu-Tsu-Tsukuyo! Stop!
You're sending shivers down my spine!
I really love watching fireworks!

Really? Then you have to see
the ones in Mizuna.
Shall we go together?
Oh, yeah, I'm definitely there!

*Sigh* I'll never finish my
summer assignments
I can help if you want me to?

Thanks, Tsukuyo, but I'm fine.
I got this!

Convincing my mother and grandmother to
let me come here was tiring.

My dad too. But today was so fun,
it was worth it!
For sure!
Hm?
Oh, are you looking at our hair clips?
*Giggle*
Pretty, aren't they?

The tropical ocean style drew
us right to them too!

I saved until I could buy
our dream swimsuits!

They match, and are the perfect
reward for Tsukasa's diligence!
I wanna play by my own rules today!
Yeah, I'm ready to take it easy.
OFF goes the phone!
We gotta enjoy this!
Yes, certainly!

"Your swimsuit sizes are different,
even though you're twins."
That is what the woman said at the shop…
So rude! Who asked her, anyway?!
Let's go, Tsukuyo!
All right, Tsukasa!

*Sigh*
Finally, we can go back into the water...
This banana boat is very heavy...
We caught such a huge wave that time!
For sure!

I'll try to keep this up...so I can be
a better shot with a water gun!
Nice! Nailed every shot in a row!
I can definitely keep Tsukuyo safe now!

I hope I can keep making
lovely memories with Tsukuyo...

The shells you collected
are so pretty, Tsukuyo!

I may make a photo frame with them
to remind me of this trip.
